data.name: Warface - Weapon set "Earth Shaker"
data.detailed_description:
About the "Earth Shaker" set


The weapons of the series are made in the style of the special operation "Earth Shaker": cracks run through the body of the guns, through which you can see that the weapon is charged with primal power!



The bright animation will not leave any Warface player indifferent, and the power encompassed in these guns will bring down a rain of fire on any enemy.



The set includes four fiery models — one for each class: "Rifleman", "Medic", "Engineer" and "Sniper". The technical characteristics of the guns do not differ from their regular versions

Earth Shaker Type 97

The assault rifle is effective at all distances and trumps its closest competitors thanks to a light, easily controlled recoil. Among other things, the gun is distinguished by high damage and range. The disadvantage is that shooting from the hip has lower accuracy.


Earth Shaker Mossberg 500 Custom

In his properties, the shotgun resembles the Benelli Nova Tactical. This is a powerful "pump" that often kills in a single shot. Reloading one round after another will save your life in the midst of a fight more than once. However, you should also consider the disadvantages that are characteristic of pump-action weapons: preferably you have to hit the enemy on your first shot, because there may be no time for a second one.


Earth Shaker FN SCAR-L PDW

The weapon has amazing properties: excellent damage, range, and shooting accuracy make this submachine gun a formidable weapon in the hands of any soldier. You can attach a unique tactical handle at the fore-end, which increases the reload speed. A common drawback for an engineer is the low range.


Earth Shaker McMillan CS5

Compact bolt-action sniper rifle, designed for combat in urban environments. It has a high rate of fire, good range, and a built-in silencer, which will help you to remain hidden after each shot.




Of course, by using this weapon, you can earn a lot of achievements.



After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: The set includes four bright and killer weapon models from the "Earth Shaker" series. Fire literally flows through the veins of these guns, and you are unlikely to encounter a more fearsome weapon!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
